column1: Kata Robata////I had my first omakase experience here back in June. It was a wonderful experience
column3: with a good mix of hot and cold items. A standout is the wagyu beef with the egg on it. Amongst the negiri and sashimi I enjoyed the salmon and the Sebring the most. I didn't like the uni or unagi (eel) too much
column4: but everything else was excellent. Some of the more exotic stuff like pufferfish is seasonal so they might not have every single fish.
